@EU_Commission 
Europe must not give Ukrainian waters to Russia.
@EU_Commission
@EU_Commission Stop furling Russia’s war machine and close the sky. That’s all we need from you to stop this war.

@EU_Commission @JosepBorrellF, @NATO, @JoeBiden 
Now crimes in Bucha. EU, USA, NATO always reactive, must happens always something. What about take the Lead, instead being scared waiting the next step of Kremlin and Putin? It really looks that its Kremlin who decids the future
@EU_Commission Yes and the European union is helping more people to flee buy fueling the Russian war machine by buying Gass and oil wake up double moral people.
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau Stop financing russian terror and genocide in Ukraine!!!! Shame on you!!! Embargo now!
@EU_Commission Until Zelensky accepts neutrality, this war will continue. Will Zelensky be investigated by the Hague for crimes against civilians in the Donbass from 2014-2021?

@EU_Commission When there will be 44 million Ukrainians in the EU, we will know that there is no going back. NATO and Zelensky, with a desire to upset the balance of military nuclear forces (NATO in Ukraine), have launched a war that will permanently exclude Ukrainians from Ukraine.
@EU_Commission Stop financing russian terror and genocide in Ukraine!!!! Shame on you!!! Embargo now!
@EU_Commission how many wespons for peace did you send today in Ukraine? hypocrites

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen    each week  "new sanctions"  Jesus christ  it's 6 weeks of bombing  why delay delays  anyone would think you wanted PURE EVIL to succeed
The time for new sanctions is OVER    100% Sanctions NOW  to save EU lives short term!  U did it for taliban !

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau I repeat! Alia Azizi, a member of the ethnic #Hazara community and the Head of Herat Women’s Prison, never returned home after going to work on 2 Oct 2021. She has been in Taliban captivity for over 6 months now. 
#FreeAliaAzi
@EU_Commission Yes they are taking full advantage of this war in dumping this underdeveloped and corrupt Ukraine.
@EU_Commission What they really wanted was a strong and fearless EU agains Russia and theirs atrocities! They don’t want to leave home…
@EU_Commission Here in Germany we were told to go back to our counties
@EU_Commission You are all complete tools.

'MOLECULES OF FREEDOM' @EUROPAQUE

@EU_Commission @EUCouncil 💙💛
@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt 💙💛

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau What are we waiting for? Are we waiting for the GULAG's to reopen? (if they ever closed...!!!). What else do we need to see and watch fearlessly, to react in a more assertive and muscular way???
@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt Russia's Führer 'Volodymyr' Putin, the BUTCHER of Bucha, Mariupol, Kharkiv, etc.
@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU Wait, what risks?!

@EU_Commission @EurobarometerEU #novavax or nothing!

@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt Support Ukraine with all military means, stop these massacres! If you are too craven to do what's right, do at least what's needed and cut all russian trade and impose secondary sanctions on all countries trading with Russia.  EU must accept to pay the price of its values.

@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt Accountability rests on decisive EU action NOW. Finding enough alternative sources of energy to enable serious consideration of targeting Russian energy exports is a priority that cannot continue to be restrained by disagreements between European foreign ministers

Pour #Katyn ils ont menti et nié pendant 50 ans.

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau Deutschlands Rechtsstaat:Sie haben Putin-Waffen an die Linke verkauft(trotz des Embargos) Hunderte Autos mit dem Buchstaben "Z"fahren durchBerlin-Menschen verlieren ihre Jobs für Videos über Putins Verbrechen-Sie blockieren EU-Gas-und Ölsanktionen mit🇷🇺Sie blockierten Sanktionen
@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt The EU is being used as a weapon, and it's happy as hell! America, on the other hand, is flush with cash! Eu? Are You Stupid?
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau The biggest winner of the war in Ukraine is the United States! The European Union is the biggest loser!

Where were you when it happened?

Instead of launching sanctions in 2014, EU did this only now, when it was too late.

@EU_Commission Zelensky can't save his people from Russian's rapists, murderers and kidnappers. These crimes in making are on western democracies for slow and unequal help to  170 thousands Russian troops on the ground.

@EU_Commission @EUCouncil @Europarl_EN this war and sanctions are directly effecting your economy not #US_UK that is they are looking forward to. @POTUS is going to earn by selling arms targeting @KremlinRussia_E on your shoulders.
@EU_Commission @ComisionEuropea @IntlCrimCourt We know already  that's fake and propaganda
@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt Yes turn of the Gass can't take this long to wake up

@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt On Boucha-butcher, Russia appeals to the Security Council. The absence of any moral conscience and the shameless indecency brought to this level of enormity pass the threshold of obscenity. To see and live this naked darkness, we know that there is indeed an evil empire.
@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt propaganda is running rampant..

@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt Bold arrogance and trampling on human dignity: The #Russia’n regime denies the executions staged. Does Russia mean that the Ukrainians themselves staged neck-shots, that is, the executions of their own citizens? #attack #massacre #withUkraine #EU
@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt Yes, so stop sending money to Russia
@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt Between 2014 and 2021, Ukrainians slaughtered more than 10,000 Russians who were citizens of Ukraine with knives. He's coming back now!

@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt You have been witnessing a Terrible Incredible Genocide Extermination of Ukraine for more than a month!!!Incredible what happened in 2022, unbelievable NONE OF YOU POWERFUL has immediately stopped everything!!!!And it continues a DON'T stop it!!!! What are you waiting for?!?!!!!!
@EU_Commission @IntlCrimCourt We invite the commission to Mariupol! If @UN still counts in Ukraine only 1417 died civilians- you don’t need to worry about your visit to #Mariupol!! 🙂

@EU_Commission @EUCouncil We Europeans must demonstrate, with deeds and not with words, that our project, our freedom, our democracy, our rule of law are a condition that creates a happy, sustainable, creative and peaceful society.
@EU_Commission @EUCouncil When you have 44 million Ukrainians in the EU, you will achieve your goals!

@EU_Commission tweets with ukrainian flags - insufficient support. Deprive Russia of money, take away their ability to buy weapons. Give up Russian gas and oil - blood flows through these pipes! You are required! Otherwise, you become an accomplice in war crimes.

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau You Are A Joke.

European Union Is A Joke.

NATO Is A Joke.

A country with a gdp of Spain, and 10% the population of NATO doing what ever they want, when ever they want, how ever they want it, and you people pretend to help with out any decisive action at the border of EU.

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau The European community must absolutely marginalize Orban's illiberal government.  It absolutely must stop all European funding and put this falsely democratic government on standby.

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau The United States is forcing Europe to impose sanctions against Moscow, but at the same time they are increasing imports of Russian oil and continue to buy mineral fertilizers. This was stated by Deputy Secretary of the Security Council of Russia Mikhail Popov, reports 3 april 20
